Name: Burger
Description: Delicious Grilled Beef patty with a lightly toasted Burger bun served with tomato, mayo and lettuce. Can also be served as a cheeseburger. Meat can only be served medium or well done.

Name: Catch of the Day
Description: Pan-fried or Grilled Catch of the day served with today’s vegetables and sides or French fries. Ask your server for today’s catch

Name: Deli Sandwiches
Description: Choose from our variety of breads and deli meats to create a delicious sandwich. Served with our signature French Fries.

Name: Omelette
Description: Fresh made omelette served plain, with cheese or veggies
